channel.title: garden on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in garden on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Lin and I removed a tiny stump from our garden.
item.description: 11:54 Saturday 08 June 2019 JST Lin and I removed a tiny stump from our garden. The bush had an infestation of caterpillars with allergenic hairs and 15:43 Saturday 08 June 2019 JST now we have a sakura tree where the bush used to be.

item.title: Planted future salad
item.description:
12:42 Wednesday 01 April 2015 JST Thanks to MDX for sending his veggies with rootballs included so I could just pop them back in the dirt!
I’m not sure which is which, but I think the one in the plastic pot is cabbage, while the others are a bit fluffier. Hopefully they’ll all grow and be happy! Hopefully we can expand our garden from here! This is actually on our neighbor’s property, but he gave Lin his blessing.
